text:
e="preserve">Tony Tanner (27 July 1932 – 8 September 2020) was a British actor, theatre director and choreographer. He was born in Hillingdon, Middlesex. His career began in 1953. He directed "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat" in the West End production in 1970. He also starred as Terry in "Strictly for the Birds" (1964) and as Littlechap in "Stop the World – I Want to Get Off" (1966).
Tanner died at his home in Los Angeles on 8 September 2020 at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat
Stop the World – I Want to Get Off
